org.intellimate.izou.sdk.addon

Class AddOn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.addon.AddOn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddOnModel, Identifiable, ContextProvider, Loggable, LoggedExceptionCallback, ExceptionCallback, ro.fortsoft.pf4j.ExtensionPoint

    public abstract class AddOn
extends Object
implements AddOnModel, ContextProvider, Loggable, LoggedExceptionCallback
    All AddOns must extend this Class. It will be instantiated and its registering-methods will be called by the PluginManager. This class has method for a properties-file named addOnID.properties (AddOnsID in the form: package.class)

      • getID

        public String getID()
        An ID must always be unique. A Class like Activator or OutputPlugin can just provide their .class.getCanonicalName() If you have to implement this interface multiple times, just concatenate unique Strings to .class.getCanonicalName()
        Specified by:
        getID in interface Identifiable
        Returns:
        A String containing an ID
